name: Hologram Projector
description: Project a hologram of the user that synchronously replays the Wanderer's weapon attacks, dealing **35%** of the user's damage. Lasts for **15** seconds. **180**-second cooldown.

advancement.star3: Tap again to transpose to the hologram's position.
advancement.star4: Increase volt damage by 2%, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
advancement.star5: Increase damage dealt by the holograms to **50%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.

cnData.description: <abbr title='China Exclusive'></abbr> Project a hologram of the user that synchronously replays the Wanderer's weapon attacks, dealing **50%** of the user's damage. Lasts for **15** seconds. **180**-second cooldown.

advancement.star2: <abbr title='China Exclusive'></abbr> Increase damage dealt by holograms to **75%** of the Wanderer's damage.
advancement.star5: <abbr title='China Exclusive'></abbr> Increase damage dealt by the holograms to **100%** of the Wanderer's damage. Transposing removes control effects.
